menuIntro.headline: MENU
menuIntro.paragraphOne: To give you a taste of what we have to offer, here's our food and drinks menu filled with delicious options.
menuIntro.paragraphTwo: Want to be surprised? No problem! Just drop by and let our team help you find the perfect dish – we're happy to advise you.
menuIntro.paragraphThree: If you have any allergies or special requests, don’t hesitate to let us know. We’ll always do our best to find a tasty solution – promise!
menuIntro.paragraphFour: Whether you're dining with us at the restaurant or enjoying our dishes from the comfort of your home – we've got you covered! You can easily order our meals for delivery as well.

menuDelivery: Enjoy it at home – order now
